resources.string: Enter a secure pattern to identify you as alternative to biometrics and password authentication:
Password is needed in order to can authenticate on web and also encrypt your passwords
Enter your password to authenticate please
Draw your pattern to authenticate please
Log in using your biometric credential
Register on SecurePassword in order to can start storing your credentials and keep you accounts safe!
This will configure the default mode to identify you on SecurePassword :)!
Oops.. Seems that something went wrong. Try again later please.
Hum.. Biometric service error. Try it again later!
Password must have at least 8 characters
Hum.. You don\'t have granted permissions to use this feature. Enable it on Settings!
Ops, it seems that biometric service are not currently available :(
Ops, no biometrics enrolled on device. Check it on Settings
Ops, this device have not biometric feature. Choose another auth method
Oops, there was an error while storing credentials :(
Oops, it seems that there was an error with pattern, try it again.
Pattern minimum length must be 4 dots.
Invalid field, email should contain \'@\' and ends with \'.com\' or \'.es\'
Invalid field, must not be blank.
